subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A.C. Milan warmed up for its second-leg match at Barcelona with a 2-0 win at Genoa but lost two key players to injury four days before the Champions League match in Spain.
snippet: A.C. Milan warmed up for its second-leg match at Barcelona with a 2-0 win at Genoa but lost two key players to injury four days before the Champions League match in Spain.
